History regular alcohol consumption within 6 month study define : An average weekly intake > 14 drinks/week men > 7 drinks/week woman . One drink equivalent ( 12 g alcohol ) = 5 ounce ( 150 ml ) wine 12 ounce ( 360 ml ) beer 1.5 ounce ( 45 ml ) 80 proof distil spirit .
